channel.title: INtech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: The Incredible Shrinking Dating App
item.description: Common wisdom is that dating apps are over. But while millennials are tired of Tinder and upsells, swiping is alive and well.
